translations: n．措辞，用词：用于表达思想、观点或信息的词语组合。
· The wordings of the contract are very important.

phrs.translation: 第一节, 合同常用词
第三章, 英文合同中常见的用词及句型
用词以精准为原则, 字

sentences.sentence: Its complex construction may easily lead to faulty wordings.
sentences.translation: 复杂定语因其结构复杂，往往容易引起语病。

sentences.sentence: Choose section titles and wordings to clearly give them this information.
sentences.translation: 选择一些能准确的给他们这些信息的段落标题和文字。

sentences.sentence: Back wordings: Silver reflective silkscreen printing wordings at the centre of the back.
sentences.translation: 回到字眼：银反射在回中心丝网印刷的字眼。
